channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Supporting Entrepreneurship and Innovation in Higher Education in The Netherlands
item.description: Supporting Entrepreneurship and Innovation in Higher Education in The Netherlands by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development, Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday, 1 October 2018, 12:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development, Directorate for Education and Skills

item.title: OECD Regions and Cities at a Glance 2018
item.description: OECD Regions and Cities at a Glance 2018 by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development has an embargo on Monday, 8 October 2018, 10:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development

item.title: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Indonesia 2018
item.description: SME and Entrepreneurship Policy in Indonesia 2018 by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development has an embargo on Wednesday, 10 October 2018, 5:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Indonesia 2018
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Indonesia 2018 by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday, 10 October 2018, 6:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action
item.description: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action by Public Affairs and Communications Directorate, Development Centre has an embargo on Thursday, 18 October 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Public Affairs and Communications Directorate, Development Centre
